bibl.title: The Robinson-Cologne Papyrus of Achilles Tatius.
bibl.note: P. Colon. Inv. 901 [ed.: Albert HENRICHS, Achilleus Tatios, aus Buch III (P. Colon. inv. 901), ZPE 2 (1968) pp. 211-226] + P. Robinson Inv. 35. ACHILLES TATIUS III, 17-24. Provenance unknown, early IIIrd century.
WILLIS William H., The Robinson-Cologne Papyrus of Achilles Tatius.
141.4 P. Colon. Inv. 901 + P. Robinson Inv. 35
